cookingLevel.title: Novice
cookingLevel.description: Basic understainding of kitchen tools and basic cooking techniques such as boiling, and friying.

cookingLevel.title: Intermediate
cookingLevel.description: Ability to follow recipes, prepare simple dishes, and basic knife skills.

cookingLevel.title: Advanced
cookingLevel.description: underestanding of cooking principles, create recipes and proficiency in various cooking techniques such as baking, grilling, and roasting.

cookingLevel.title: Professional
cookingLevel.description: Expert with extensive education, training, and experience in cooking techniques, menu planing, and kitchen management.
